snippet: Ishmael Butler and Tendai Maraire — who compose the creative center of Shabazz Palaces — are shaking up Seattle’s diverse, idiosyncratic and growing hip-hop scene.
abstract: Hip-hop act Shabazz Palaces is newest group to stir up Seattle's growing scene, reflecting diverse and experimental culture of area; band's second full-length album, Lese Majesty, is characteristically off-kilter, matching their live performances and earlier work.
lead_paragraph: Ishmael Butler and Tendai Maraire — who compose the creative center of Shabazz Palaces — are shaking up Seattle’s diverse, idiosyncratic and growing hip-hop scene.

headline.seo: Shabazz Palaces Shake Up Seattle’s Hip-Hop Scene
headline.main: Sci-Fi Beats With a Pacific Flavor
headline.print_headline: Sci-Fi Beats With a Pacific Flavor
